column1: 10/10 - Great job identifying the production function as a suitable candidate for scrum/sprint methodologies and providing a clear explanation of how it could be implemented. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how scrum/sprint could operate. Great job explaining the implementation of scrum/sprint in the production function. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good effort in explaining the benefits of scrum/sprint and kanban for different functions. However, the explanation of why kanban is a poor fit for the production function could be clearer and more specific. Keep up the good work!

10/10 - Excellent identification of the distribution function as a suitable candidate for implementing kanban methodologies. Great explanation of how kanban could operate in this function with a clear list of possible columns. Keep up the good work!

12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate.

Great job explaining how kanban could be implemented in the distribution function! Keep up the good work.

7 pts for Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit

Good job discussing the distribution function and its potential benefits from kanban. However, the explanation of why scrum/sprint is a poor fit for this function could be more specific and clear. Keep up the good work!
5/5 - Excellent job identifying confirmation bias as a relevant issue in this situation and providing actionable suggestions to address it. Keep up the good work!

10/10

Great job defining confirmation bias and providing actionable steps to avoid it. Keep up the excellent work!
12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job identifying and explaining the confirmation bias and its potential impact on decision-making. Keep up the good work!
10/10 - Excellent work! You provided clear and detailed descriptions of the steps and actions for implementing agile methodologies in Mighty Jaxx's operations. Keep up the great work!
